Text:
One day, at the Shadow Garden hideout, the Seven
Shadows were called together.

Umm...so why are we here today? Did I do something
wrong?!

Then only a certain dumb dog would be here,
wouldn't she?
You're probably right...

...Huh?! Hey pussy cat! Are you calling me a
dumb dog?!
I thought you could figure that out, but maybe not?

Could you guys knock it off, please? I'm sure
Lady Alpha will know the reason why we were
called here.

It's pretty rare...that most of us are here
on time...
...And this is coming from you?

More importantly, where's Gamma? Even Eta is on time.
It's not like her to be late.
I was ready...five minutes ago...heheh.
You seem quite full of yourself today...

I wonder if something happened to Gamma. Maybe she
got seriously injured...
I doubt it...but I can't say that with confidence...

Aroo! Does that mean we're here to find out that
Gamma's been kicked out?! It's finally my time to
step up to third rank!
Then...good luck running Mitsugoshi...

Eep?! That's way too hard! Beta, I'll let you be
third place if you let me be second!
That's not a fair deal at all...
Everyone is energetic as usual I see.
The five members face Alpha, who has shown up late.

I only picked up part of your conversation,
but surely Gamma is fine as I haven't heard
word about her being injured.
Y-You were listening?! Not that I said anything bad!
Anyways, enough fooling around...

So why are we here today, Lady Alpha? It's not the
time for our regular meetings...
I have no idea myself, actually.
Huh?

Gamma is the one who requested this meeting, so it
would be better to ask her.
Speaking of Gamma, here she comes.
*splat!*
Yep, that sounds like Gamma!

The door opens slowly, and a disheveled Gamma
staggers in.
Th-Thank you for coming...everyone...
Your nose is bleeding...

Gamma wipes away the blood and begins talking as if
nothing had happened.
Ahem... I'll get right to the point then.

Exactly one month from today I would like to hold
an anniversary party to express our gratitude to
our lord, for all he has done for us!
Anniversary...
Party?!
Will there be loads of yummy food to eat?!

A party! What a lovely idea! It'd be a fantastic
chance to show our appreciation!
He might enjoy the change of pace.

But a party is quite unusual. Aren't there usually
other reasons to hold one?

You're quite right. If I hadn't learned about the idea
from him, I wouldn't have thought of it myself.
Previously, he taught me several business tricks.

To "create business opportunities instead of waiting
for them," and that "everyone's looking for reasons
to buy what they want, but those who create reasons
are the winners."

Everyone's reaction earlier after hearing the words
"party" and "anniversary" is the proof. We can
create whatever reasons we want to celebrate!
I see...
However, it does need to be convincing...

Take Mitsugoshi, for example, and our "First
Anniversary Celebration."

However, such a specific occasion isn't always
necessary. We can turn events such as a "Customer
Appreciation Festival" or a "Bargain Sale" into
business chances.

Importantly, our feelings are the theme. We can
have a party simply by being united in our desire
to express gratitude to our lord!
So then...every day is an anniversary! Right?!
Were you even listening, Delta?

Well...I suppose that's one way of looking at it...
I only meant to explain the concept of anniversaries.

There is the wonderful idea that any time is a
good time to celebrate, which means this party
is not unusual at all.
Everyone understands, right?

Yes, of course. If Master Shadow taught you that,
Gamma, then he might be expecting something big!

In any case, it's the thought that counts. We can
celebrate the fact that we haven't lost anyone in
all this fighting, and thank him properly—
Let's keep that in mind as we prepare.

And since you're in charge, Gamma, I trust you will
do your best.

Absolutely. I'll do everything possible to make it
a success!

All right, everyone, let's give our lord the best
party ever!
Yes!
